name: DeFi Protocol Evaluation
description: Framework for Layer 1 blockchains to evaluate decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols based on liquidity, economic sustainability, security, and composability.
author: Shai Perendik

categories.name: Liquidity Metrics
categories.description: Assessment of liquidity and trading activity.

metrics.name: Total Value Locked (TVL)
metrics.description: Total assets currently deposited into the protocol.
metrics.importance: Indicator of market trust and economic activity.

metrics.name: 24h Trading Volume
metrics.description: Daily trading activity on the protocol.
metrics.importance: Shows active usage and liquidity health.

categories.name: Economic Health Metrics
categories.description: Evaluates the protocol's financial sustainability and tokenomics.

metrics.name: Token Distribution Fairness
metrics.description: Fairness and decentralization of token supply.

categories.name: Security & Risk Metrics
categories.description: Measures protocol security and risk management effectiveness.

metrics.name: Smart Contract Audit Status
metrics.description: Completeness and recency of security audits.

metrics.name: Insurance Coverage
metrics.description: Availability of insurance coverage for protocol assets.
metrics.importance: Mitigates potential loss due to exploits.

categories.name: Composability & Integration
categories.description: Evaluates interoperability with other DeFi protocols.

metrics.name: Number of Active Integrations
metrics.description: Active partnerships with other DeFi protocols.

categories.name: User & Community Metrics
categories.description: Quantitative analysis of community activity and user engagement.

metrics.name: Monthly Active Users
metrics.description: Users actively interacting with protocol monthly.
